post.title: NFT?
post.text:
I am a prolific artist, and I live a life devoted to creativity. Am I successful? It depends on what you think is being successful. I have focused on developing ideas for my art and concepts for the last five years rather than my professional career. I donâ€™t need to tell you that time seems to move faster as you age. We are bombarded with depressing reminders of our aging!

Life is about exploration! However, it can be overwhelming at moments.
